'''2.0.729''' ([[wikipedia:Microsoft Windows|Windows]]) is a version of the [[Minecraft launcher|launcher]] released on February 1, 2017.

== Fixes ==
* Fix for update process.
* Fix for problems with mods.
* {{bug|MCL-5299}}: Launcher updated to 2.0.x and downgraded to 1.6.76 again.
* {{bug|MCL-5337}}: "Browse" button in custom log config without function.
